DOC.brief_summary: Objectives : To investigate acute effect olive oil , palm olein lard lipid profile , insulin sensitivity inflammatory marker . Hypothesis : Different dietary fat alter lipid profile , insulin sensitivity inflammatory marker postprandially .
DOC.brief_title: The Acute Effects Oleic Acid Enriched-diets Lipids , Insulin Sensitivity Serum Inflammatory Markers
DOC.detailed_description: A randomize , single blind , crossover design undertaken test meal enrich palm olein v olive oil v lard . Volunteers ask participate three postprandial challenge , separate least 3-days . Subjects provide low fat meal ( < 10g fat ) day intervention . Fasting blood collect next day subject instruct consume test meal ( 50g high fat meal ) . Further venous blood collect 30 min , 1h , 2h , 3h 4h postprandially . Primary outcome variable : Triacylglycerol ( TAG ) Secondary outcome variable : Insulin sensitivity ( glucose , insulin ) , non esterify fatty acid ( NEFA ) , inflammatory marker
DOC.criteria: Age : 1845 year BMI : 18.530 kg/m^2 Healthy , men medical history cardiovascular disease , cancer , diabetes chronic disease BMI < 18.5 OR > 30 kg/m^2 waist hip ratio > 0.9 total cholesterol > 5.2 mmol/L triacylglycerol ( TAG ) > 2.2 mmol/L current use antihypertensive lipid lower medication
